endpoints.description: Create a new energy supply-demand model with specific parameters.
Retrieve a list of all energy models available within the system.
Update parameters of an existing energy model by supplying its unique identifier.
Retrieve actionable insights based on current energy data and predictions.
Perform specific actions related to energy storage or release within defined parameters.
Gather analytical insights on energy usage patterns.
Set up an alert mechanism to notify stakeholders about energy events.
Receive recommended strategies for energy management optimization.
Update user preferences regarding energy storage strategies.
